skills.name: agentic-shift-roadmap
skills.definition: Strategic response to 2026 AI predictions: Memory breakthrough (Graph-Service), Long-running agents (Ralph loop), AI reviewing AI (AI Arena for QA), Proactive AI (persistent monitors), Task inbox (async queue).

skills.name: tdd-task-execution
skills.definition: Test-Driven task execution: Write failing test → Run to verify failure → Implement → Run to verify pass → Commit. Each task independently committable with rollback plan.

skills.name: websocket-subscription-pattern
skills.definition: ConnectionManager tracks sessions, subscriptions by topic. NATS-to-WebSocket bridge converts subjects to topics. Auto-reconnect with exponential backoff.

skills.name: sprint-planning-pattern
skills.definition: Sprint tracking with status table, detailed deliverables per sprint, key files created, dependencies mapped, success criteria defined.

skills.name: agent-observability-design
skills.definition: Monitor long-running agents: Progress timeline with checkpoints, drift detection (output divergence, repeated failures), resource burn tracking (tokens, time, cost), intervention triggers, one-click course correction.

skills.name: automated-qa-pipeline
skills.definition: AI reviewing AI: Judge model infrastructure with PolicyChecker, FactualityChecker, CompletenessChecker, DomainLinter. Pass → Auto-approve, Fail → Human review queue.
skills.workflow: Agent Output → QA Pipeline → Judge Models → QA Report → Pass/Fail routing

skills.name: task-inbox-pattern
skills.definition: Async task queue: Email/Slack/API → Task Queue (priority) → Agent Pool (assignment) → Execution + QA → Result + Graph.

concepts.name: Proactivity Profile
concepts.definition: User preferences for agent interruptions: interrupt_threshold (low/medium/high), preferred_channels, quiet_hours, domain-specific rules.

concepts.name: Learning Capture
concepts.definition: Track corrections for future skill improvement: original_output, human_correction, context, pattern_extracted, skill_update_suggested.

concepts.name: Drift Event
concepts.definition: Detected deviation from expected agent behavior: execution_id, drift_type, severity. Triggers intervention workflow.

concepts.name: QA Report
concepts.definition: Aggregated quality assessment from judge models: unified score, issue summary, pass/fail determination, issues list.

relationships.description: Extends AI Arena from hypothesis debates to output QA
Task results go through QA pipeline
